description: Search hotels by city, state, country, or geolocation and explore detailed property info. Check live availability, compare rates and room types, and review boards and promotions. Create ready-to-book links with preselected rooms, rates, supplements, and optional guest details.

tools.name: get_all_paraty_hotels_with_info
tools.description:
Get paginated list of all ParatyTech hotels with complete information including location, contact, ratings, and amenities.

	**When to use**: User wants to browse all hotels, asks "show me all hotels" or "list available hotels".

	**Returns**:
	- hotels: List of hotel objects with identification, location, contact info, TripAdvisor ratings, amenities, and room types
	- pagination: Metadata with page, page_size, total_hotels, total_pages, has_next, has_previous

	**Usage**: Start with page=1, page_size=50. Use pagination.has_next to fetch more pages if needed.

tools.name: get_hotel
tools.description:
Retrieve detailed information about a specific hotel by its unique code.

	**When to use**: When hotel_code were provided by user or another tool".

	**Returns**: Complete hotel object with identification, location, contact info, TripAdvisor ratings, amenities, room types, and policies. Returns null if hotel code not found.

	**Hotel code format**: Lowercase kebab-case (e.g., "tarik", "landmar-arena", "port-azafata").

hotel_code.title: Hotel Code
hotel_code.description: Unique hotel identifier in lowercase kebab-case

tools.name: search_hotels_by_city
tools.description:
Search for hotels in a specific city with complete details.

	**When to use**: User mentions a city name like 'Fuengirola', 'Torremolinos', 'Benidorm'.

	**Returns**: List of hotel objects with location, contact info, ratings, and amenities.

tools.name: search_hotels_by_state
tools.description:
Search for hotels in a specific state or province.

	**When to use**: User mentions a state, province like 'Malaga', 'Madrid', 'Barcelona'.

	**Returns**: List of hotel objects with complete information. Case-insensitive search.

tools.name: search_hotels_by_country
tools.description:
Search for hotels in a specific country.

	**When to use**: User mentions a country like 'Spain', 'France', 'United States', or wants all hotels in a country.

	**Returns**: List of hotel objects with location, contact, ratings, and amenities. Use full country names in English.

tools.name: search_hotels_by_geo_location
tools.description:
Search for hotels near GPS coordinates within a specified radius, sorted by distance.

	**When to use**: User provides a specific place that is not a city, state or country itself, you must search the GPS coordinates about that place and use them in this tool.

	**Returns**: Hotels sorted by distance with location, contact, ratings, and distance in kilometers.

radius_km.title: Radius Km
radius_km.description: Search radius in kilometers. Use 1-5km for cities, 10-50km for regions

tools.name: get_availability
tools.description:
Search hotel room availability and pricing for specific dates and occupancy. Returns real-time availability, room types, rates, meal plans, and pricing.

	**When to use**: User wants to book a hotel, asks "check availability", "what rooms are available", or provides dates and guest count.

	**Required parameters**:
	- hotel_code: Hotel identifier (e.g., "tarik", "landmar-arena")
	- start_date: Check-in date in DD/MM/YYYY format (e.g., "13/10/2025")
	- end_date: Check-out date in DD/MM/YYYY format (e.g., "20/10/2025")

	**CRITICAL - Date format**: Must be DD/MM/YYYY (European format). NOT MM/DD/YYYY or YYYY-MM-DD.
	Examples: "25/12/2025" (Christmas), "01/01/2026" (New Year)

	**Occupancy** (optional, defaults to 2 adults in 1 room):
	- num_rooms: 1-3 rooms
	- adults_roomN, children_roomN, babies_roomN for each room (N=1,2,3)
	- children: ages 2-12 years, babies: ages 0-2 years

	**Optional filters**: promo_code, currency (EUR/USD/GBP), language (en/es/fr), show_names, country_code

	**Returns**:
	- result: Available room/rate combinations with pricing
	- resultsPerDay: Daily price breakdown
	- promotions: Applicable promotional offers
	- names: Translated names for rooms, rates, meal plans
	- extra: roomMaxAvailability, availability counts, restrictions, notAvailable dates
	- search: Echo of search parameters

	**Examples**:
	- Simple: get_availability("tarik", "15/03/2026", "18/03/2026")
	- Family: add adults_room1=2, children_room1=2, currency="EUR"
	- Multi-room: set num_rooms=2, adults_room1=2, adults_room2=2
	- With promo: add promo_code="SUMMER2025"

	**Note**: Maximum 3 rooms per search. Availability is real-time but not reserved until booking confirmed.

short_key.title: Short Key
short_key.description: Short key identifier for special searches

tools.name: get_rooms_info
tools.description:
Get detailed room types information for a specific hotel including capacities, descriptions, and photos.

	**When to use**: User asks about room types, room details, or room amenities for a specific hotel or you don't have enough information about rooms.

	**Returns**: List of room objects with capacities, names, descriptions, photos, and unique keys.

tools.name: get_rates_info
tools.description:
Get available rate plans and pricing policies for a specific hotel including cancellation policies.

	**When to use**: User asks about rate plans, cancellation policies, pricing options for a specific hotel or you need these information for another tool.

	**Returns**: List of rate objects with names, descriptions, dates, cancellation policies, and unique keys.

tools.name: get_boards_info
tools.description:
Get meal plan options (board types) for a specific hotel with descriptions.

	**When to use**: User asks about meal plans, board options, food service types for a specific hotel or you need these for another tool.

	**Returns**: List of board/meal plan objects with names, descriptions, and unique keys.

tools.name: search_b0
tools.description:
Search hotel availability across multiple hotels simultaneously. Returns a list of available hotels for the specified dates and occupancy.

	**When to use**: ONLY when user wants to compare multiple hotels from the same hotel chain.

	**Required**: Either 'destination' OR 'applicationIds' (semicolon-separated hotel codes like "hotel1;hotel2;hotel3")

	**Dates**: startDate and endDate in DD/MM/YYYY format (defaults to today and tomorrow if not provided)

	**Occupancy**: occupancy_per_room as list of dicts with adults, children, babies, pets per room.
	Example: [{"adults": 2, "children": 1, "babies": 0}]

	**Returns**: Booking URL showing list of available hotels for the user to explore.

endDate.title: Enddate
endDate.description: Check-out date in DD/MM/YYYY format. Defaults to startDate + 1 day if not provided.

days_num.title: Days Num
days_num.description: Number of days to stay. Used to calculate endDate if not provided.

startDate.title: Startdate
startDate.description: Check-in date in DD/MM/YYYY format. Defaults to today if not provided.

destination.title: Destination
destination.description: Destination code to search hotels in an area. Required if applicationIds not provided.

applicationIds.title: Applicationids
applicationIds.description: Semicolon-separated hotel codes (e.g., 'hotel1;hotel2;hotel3'). Required if destination not provided.

entry_tomorrow.title: Entry Tomorrow
entry_tomorrow.description: Set to 1 to use tomorrow as default check-in if startDate not provided

occupancy_per_room.title: Occupancy Per Room
occupancy_per_room.description: List of occupancy dicts per room with keys: adults, children, babies, pets

tools.name: search_b1
tools.description:
Search room availability in a specific hotel. Shows all available room types, rates, and meal plan options.

	**When to use**: User wants to see available rooms by itself, from the webpage.

	**Required**: hotel_code (Get it from get_all_hotels)

	**Dates**: startDate and endDate in DD/MM/YYYY format

	**Occupancy**: 
	- occupancy_per_room: List of dicts per room (adults, children, babies, pets)
	- ages_kid_per_room: Optional list of lists with children ages per room (e.g., [[5, 8], None])
	- ages_baby_per_room: Optional list of lists with baby ages per room

	**Filters**:
	- promocode: Apply promotional code (e.g., "RESIDENTE", "EARLY_BOOKING")
	- roomFilter: Regex to filter rooms (e.g., ".*suite.*")
	- rate_filter_regex: Regex to filter rates (e.g., ".*FLEXIBLE.*")

	**Returns**: Booking URL with available rooms, rates, and pricing for the hotel.

roomFilter.title: Roomfilter
roomFilter.description: Regular expression to filter room types

ages_kid_per_room.title: Ages Kid Per Room
ages_kid_per_room.description: List of lists with children ages per room. None for rooms without children.

ages_baby_per_room.title: Ages Baby Per Room
ages_baby_per_room.description: List of lists with baby ages per room. None for rooms without babies.

occupancy_per_room.title: Occupancy Per Room
occupancy_per_room.description: List of dicts per room with adults, children, babies, pets

specific_rate_search.title: Specific Rate Search
specific_rate_search.description: Regex for specific rate. Shows no availability if not found.

standard_preselection.title: Standard Preselection
standard_preselection.description: Show standard prices tab by default (if club configured)

target_hotel_namespace.title: Target Hotel Namespace
target_hotel_namespace.description: Target hotel namespace (only if multiple hotels share domain)

tools.name: search_b2
tools.description:
Create prebuilt booking URL with preselected room, rate, and meal plan. Hotel must have "Enable direct search" configured.

	**When to use**: After B1 search, user has selected specific room/rate/board and wants direct booking link.

	**Required**:
	- hotel_code: Hotel identifier
	- occupancyN: Format "adults-children-babies" (e.g., "2-1-0")
	- room_preselection: List of dicts with roomKey, rateKey, boardKey (datastore keys from previous search)

	**IMPORTANT**: All keys (roomKey, rateKey, boardKey) must be valid keys obtained from get_availability.

	**Returns**: Direct booking URL with preselected options ready for confirmation.

entry_tomorrow.title: Entry Tomorrow
entry_tomorrow.description: Use tomorrow as check-in (1) or today (0)

room_preselection.title: Room Preselection
room_preselection.description: List of dicts with roomKey, rateKey, boardKey per room (all required)

tools.name: search_b3
tools.description:
Create complete prebuilt booking URL with preselected room, rate, meal plan, supplements, and prefilled guest details. Most comprehensive booking link creation tool.

	**CRITICAL**: Always run get_availability FIRST to obtain valid keys (roomKey, rateKey, boardKey) before using this tool.

	**When to use**: User wants a complete direct booking link with all options preselected, including optional supplements and guest information prefilled.

	**Required**:
	- hotel_code: Hotel unique identifier
	- occupancyN: Format "adults-children-babies" (e.g., "2-0-0" for 2 adults, no children/babies)

	**Dates**: startDate and endDate in DD/MM/YYYY format

	**Room Preselection** (optional but recommended):
	- room_preselection: List of dicts with roomKey, rateKey, boardKey per room
	  Keys must be valid datastore keys from get_availability results

	**Rate Filters** (optional):
	- rate_filter or rate_filter_list: Filter specific rates
	- rate_filter_regex: Regex to filter rates
	- package_preselection: Show packages tab by default
	- standard_preselection: Show standard prices tab by default

	**Supplements** (optional):
	- supplement_preselection: List of dicts with supplementKey, supplementAmount, supplementDays
	  If supplementKey provided, supplementAmount and supplementDays are REQUIRED
	  Example: [{"supplementKey": "key123", "supplementAmount": 1, "supplementDays": 5}]

	**Personal Details Autofill** (optional):
	- personal_details: Dict to prefill guest information
	  Available: pdName, pdSurname, pdEmail, pdPhone, pdCountry, pdPersonalId, 
	  pdBirthDay/Month/Year (or pdBirthDate as DD/MM/YYYY), pdComments
	  Example: {"pdName": "Juan", "pdEmail": "juan@example.com", "pdCountry": "ES"}

	**Usage Flow**:
	1. First: get_availability(hotel_code, dates)  Get valid keys
	2. Then: search_b3(hotel_code, occupancyN, room_preselection with keys from step 1)

	**Returns**: Complete booking URL with all preselections and autofilled data, ready for user to confirm reservation.

	**Note**: Hotel must have "Enable direct search" configuration enabled.

entry_tomorrow.title: Entry Tomorrow
entry_tomorrow.description: Use tomorrow as check-in (1) or today (0)

personal_details.title: Personal Details
personal_details.description: Dict to prefill guest info: pdName, pdSurname, pdEmail, pdPhone, pdCountry, etc.

rate_filter_list.title: Rate Filter List
rate_filter_list.description: List of rate identifiers (converted to comma-separated)

room_preselection.title: Room Preselection
room_preselection.description: List of dicts with roomKey, rateKey, boardKey per room (from get_availability)

standard_preselection.title: Standard Preselection
standard_preselection.description: Show standard prices tab by default

supplement_preselection.title: Supplement Preselection
supplement_preselection.description: List of dicts with supplementKey, supplementAmount, supplementDays
